definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: Eric Suen Yiu Wai and Chan Fa La felt embarrassed when they were playing heartbeat measurement.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威和陳法拉玩量度心跳，都感尷尬。

sentences.english: All night long, you can feel my heart palpitates.
sentences.chinese: 長夜漫漫，你能否感覺我的心跳。

sentences.english: Exam, only write the pen of the broken broken voice and more or less beating.
sentences.chinese: 考試中，只有寫字筆的碎碎聲音和或多或少的心跳聲。

sentences.english: The night we rely on the tight, confusion of each other's heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕下我們靠的太緊，混淆了彼此的心跳。

sentences.english: I get so kilig everytime Ben and Felicity get together.
sentences.chinese: 每次我看到本和費利西蒂在一起時就讓我臉紅心跳的。

sentences.english: When a beat pushes the blood out, the clot can go right to the brain.
sentences.chinese: 當心跳將血液泵出時，有可能直接把凝塊送入大腦。

sentences.english: This, of course, depends on the nature of the tachycardia.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這是由心跳過速的性質而定的。

sentences.english: My heart thumps fast. My wrist is hurting. Wes is killing me.
sentences.chinese: 我心跳加快，手腕很疼，維斯簡直是在要我的命啊。

sentences.english: The flight or fight response includes a rapid heartbeat and dry mouth, trembling hands.
sentences.chinese: 戰或逃的反應包括心跳加速，嘴巴發乾，雙手顫抖。

sentences.english: Your very voice is in my heartbeat, sweeter than my dream.
sentences.chinese: 你獨特的嗓音銘刻在我愛的心跳裏，比夢還甜。

sentences.english: He knelt down and leaned over Professor Burns' chest.
sentences.chinese: 他跪下來，趴在博恩斯教授的胸口上想聽聽她的心跳。

sentences.english: Yes, when I wake up, my heart beats very fast and I am perspiring.
sentences.chinese: 當我醒來的時候，心跳得非常快，而且在出汗。

sentences.english: I offer the heart beat on the drum and there is a quieting in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 我提供了心跳的鼓和有一個心平靜下來。

sentences.english: The combined contraction of the atria and ventricles is a heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 這種心房和心室收縮的結合稱爲一次心跳。

sentences.english: Because he closes his eyes and falls back asleep.
sentences.chinese: 現在她的心跳再一次放慢了，因爲他閉上眼又睡着了。

sentences.english: I was dizzy and woozy , and my heart was racing.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得頭暈目眩，然後我的心跳很快。

definition: to throb/to pulse/to bounce/to jiggle/to jump about
thumping sound (onom.)/to be eager and anxious (to do sth)/faithful and upright
to jump about/(of the heart) to beat wildly
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
